DOC.brief_summary: This multicentre , open label , randomize , pilot study evaluate safety efficacy Human Platelet Lysate ( HPL ) subject Androgenetic Alopecia . The study conduct 2 center India . The primary endpoint Improvement Caliber & Density hair Improvement Photographic assessment randomization end study . The secondary endpoint Physicians Patients self assessment score .
